reviews.subject: Introduction to Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is an excellent professor. Her lectures are engaging and she genuinely cares about her students' learning. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Professor Lee's class is challenging, but he is knowledgeable and willing to help students who put in the effort. The grading can be tough, but it's fair.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: Dr. Patel is passionate about the subject and her lectures are informative and thought-provoking. She encourages class discussions and makes the material interesting.

reviews.subject: Principles of Marketing
reviews.review: Professor Wilson is knowledgeable and provides relevant real-world examples. His grading is fair, and he is accessible during office hours.

reviews.subject: Intro to Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Chen is a great lecturer who makes the course material engaging and accessible. Her exams are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Calculus I
reviews.review: Professor Hernandez is knowledgeable, but his lectures can be dry and difficult to follow at times. The workload is heavy, but the material is important.

reviews.subject: Comparative Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Nguyen is an exceptional professor. Her passion for the subject is evident, and she facilitates engaging discussions. I highly recommend taking her courses.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Sociology
reviews.review: Professor Ramirez is a knowledgeable and approachable instructor. His lectures are interesting, and he is open to student questions and feedback.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry II
reviews.review: Dr. Rossi is a challenging professor, but the material is important. She is willing to help students who seek her assistance.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Programming
reviews.review: Professor Kim is a great teacher who explains concepts clearly and provides ample opportunities for hands-on learning. The course workload is manageable.

reviews.subject: Principles of Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Gonzalez's lectures are engaging and she provides helpful examples to illustrate economic theories. The course is well-organized and challenging.

reviews.subject: Differential Equations
reviews.review: Professor Zhao is knowledgeable, but his teaching style can be dry at times. The course material is difficult, but he is available for extra help.

reviews.subject: Intro to Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Patel is an enthusiastic professor who makes the course content interesting. The labs are well-designed and complement the lectures.

reviews.subject: Modern World History
reviews.review: Professor Nguyen is an engaging lecturer who brings history to life. Her assignments are challenging but fair, and she is always available to provide guidance.

reviews.subject: Principles of Management
reviews.review: Dr. Hernandez is a knowledgeable professor who relates the course material to real-world business scenarios. The workload is manageable, and he provides valuable feedback.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Professor Ramirez is an enthusiastic and approachable instructor. Her lectures are informative, and she encourages class discussion.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry I
reviews.review: Dr. Zhao is a knowledgeable professor, but her lectures can be dense and difficult to follow at times. The course workload is heavy, but the material is vital for future studies.

reviews.subject: Principles of Marketing
reviews.review: Professor Rossi is engaging and provides relevant examples to illustrate marketing concepts. The course assignments are challenging but valuable.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Kim is an exceptional professor who makes complex topics accessible. Her lectures are well-organized, and she is always available to help students.

reviews.subject: Differential Equations
reviews.review: Professor Gonzalez is knowledgeable, but his teaching style can be dry at times. The course material is challenging, and he expects a lot from his students.
